title: Lakers are real contenders, Cavaliers keep rolling and Kevin Durant's future starts this offseason
description: On this episode of Good Word with Goodwill, the Lakers continue to win, what it takes to be the face of the NBA, are the Cavaliers a lock for the Eastern Conference Finals and Kevin Durant's future.
author: Yahoo Sports

html:
On this episode of Good Word with Goodwill, Vince and Travonne Edwards unpack the Los Angeles Lakers success since acquiring Luka Doncic.

Vince and Travonne then do a deep dive on LeBron‚Äôs comments about being the face of the NBA and if Jayson Tatum is capable of holding that mantle. They also discuss why young players entering the league may be reluctant to embracing attempts at being the face of the sport.

Later, Vince and Tray take a look at the Cleveland Cavaliers excellent season and what is next for Kevin Durant with it appearing his time in Phoenix could be soon coming to an end.

(01:48) Lakers rise to the No.2 seed in Western Conference

(9:38) Face of the NBA

(22:52) Kobe received a lot of scrutiny in Los Angeles

(31:09) Younger players super equipped for NBA

(40:44) SGA vs. Joker for MVP

(42:49) LeBron 5th in MVP voting

(45:05) Kevin Durant's future
